prompt:
THEME: Mars/Moon Space Colony

STYLE:
- Sci-fi domes, modular habitats, solar panels
- Orange/red dust (Mars) or grey regolith (Moon)
- Clean futuristic design, NASA-inspired
- The Martian / For All Mankind aesthetic

ASSET DETAILS:
- Grass: FLAT rocky Mars surface tile only - dusty red-orange terrain texture, no domes or buildings
- House: Pressurized habitat module with airlock, round windows
- Shop: Supply depot with cargo containers, equipment
- Park: Biodome recreation area with trees, artificial sky
- University: Research facility with telescope, lab equipment
- Market: Trading post with landing pads, cargo shuttles
